text: Jadi satu bulan yang lalu saya menginap di hotel ini, plus nya dari hotel ini adalah makanan yg enak dan housekeeping yg ramah, tapi sisanya tidak ada yg bagus, jadi kemarin GRO nya si mbak Nikita meminta kami untuk mengisi tripadvisor ini, tapi sebelumnya dia menanyakan kekurangan dari hotel tersebut, dan dia bilang akan diperbaiki segera, dan akan kasih complimentary slice cake, karena saya menghargai dia yg berusaha memperbaiki kesalahan dari hotel ini jadi saya kasih rating bagus, dan katanya saat kami pulang nanti kamar nya akan lengkap sesuai dengan yg kami komplain tadi, dan katanya mau kasih slice cake nya dikamar, sebenad nya saya tidak begitu berharap, tapi janji seperti ini sangat fatal dilakukan, apalagi itu sudah menyangkut tamu, karena saya perhotelan juga jadi saya ngerasa pelayanan disini bad sekali, yang kemarin aku ada niatan untuk kembali menginap bersama keluarga, seketika setelah kejadian itu saya memutar otak, intinya jangan kasih harapan dan janji ke tamu, bisa jadi satu kesalahan itu tersampai dari mulut ke mulut dan membuat pandangan orang terhadap hotel itu jadi buruk, sebenar nya saya gak mau menulis ini disini karena takut menurunkan rating hotel, tapi saya email gaada respon sama sekali, jadi mohon untuk hotel ini lebih baik lagi dan bijaklah jadi manusia, dan attitude paling penting, kemarin nelfon resepsionist nya aja kayak lagi main”

text:
Hari ini kita arisan dan bukber di ruangan vip, so far tempat vip nya nyaman, tapi hospitality nya sangat kurang sekali, mulai dari manager Fb pak Wisnu yg ga bisa terima komplen, kasir yg jutek banget, makanan ga di provide dengan baik. Kapasitas resto 250 orang full hingga 300 orang, dengan kondisi masih pandemic. Makanan tidak hygiene karena bnyk yg mengambil makanan tidak menggunakan sarung tangan dan masker. Makanan habis lama sekali d reffil, piring gelas dan air minum juga kehabisan. Bener bener hotel yg tidak memikirkan pelayanan dengan baik. Asal duit dan resto full aja. 

Tolong lain kali lebih d perhatikan, jangan mentang mentang promo, ga mikir Kapasitas resto . Makanan jadi kaya sampah sangat tidak bersih jadi nya. Semua antri sampai rebutan seperti di pasar. Tidak ada sosial distancing sama sekali karena 300 pax dengan ukuran resto yg harus ny Kapasitas 250pax. Seharusnya selama pandemic at least 70% cukup. 

Cuma ketolong bapak security di depan yang ramah dan baik, sampai bantuin bawa barang... selebih nya untuk staff resto tidak ramah. Mau pakai sound system pun harus otak atik sendiri.

Sangat tidak reccomend hotel ini... apalagi resto nya!!! Saya tidak akan pernah balik lagi ....
title: Acara bukber bareng community arisan

text:
Menurut saya ini hotel bintang 3 tapi pelayanan bintang 4. Semua petugas hotelnya ramah. Mulai dari satpam, front office, restaurant, house keeping. Front office yang menangani proses booking dan check in saya yaitu Ibu Rina senyumnya menunjukkan sikap yang ramah dan respect terhadap tamu hotel. Lobby nya luas dan ada kesan mewah ketika masuk hotel ini.
Ada welcome drink berupa minuman tradisional, waktu saya check in sih wedang uwuh namanya.
Bisa early check in yaitu jam 1. Pas masuk kamar, sangat bersih dan wangi karena kebetulan tidak mau yang smoking room. Ukuran kasurnya 160 × 200. Lalu ada kulkas, safe deposit box dan coffee maker. Saluran TV nya juga lengkap. Kamar mandi sangat terjaga juga kebersihannya.
Kekurangan di hotel ini yaitu kartu kamar yang hanya diberikan 1. But, it's okay karena tetap bisa minta tolong akses dengan FO team nya.
Untuk sarapan sangat bervariasi dan memuaskan. Seperti menghidangkan makanan dari 34 provinsi di Indonesia. Rasanya pun enak enak. 
Overall sangat puas staycation di hotel ini.

text:
Dear General Manager Hotel Luminor Pecenongan . Saya mengalami kejadian yg tidak menyenangkan dan saya rasa tidak etis untuk tamu diperlakukan seperti itu . Saat itu saya lanjut memperpanjang utk menginap kembali sampai esok hari di hotel tersebut . Karena saya buru2 membawa anak saya ke RS.Husada karena urgent jadi saya belum prepare merapihkan barang2 saya . Tetapi saya sudah membayar kamar yg saya extend lalu dari pihak receptionist menghubungi saya utk memindahkan ke kamar yg deluxe karena saya tidak tahu kamar yg saya tempati saat itu executive karena pihak traveloka mengupgrade kamar saya karena kesalahan dr traveloka . Maka dari itu saya diharuskan pindah . Saat saya tiba dihotel saya sangat terkejut melihat barang2 saya berada di lobby dan ada beberapa tamu yg melihat masalah  perlakuan ini yg sangat tidak etis yg dilakukan management hotel buat saya selaku tamu . Padahal saya sudah membayar sejak pukul 12.00 siang . Tetapi akhirnya pihak hotel meminta maaf kepda saya dan keluarga dengan memberikan compliment . Semoga kejadian memalukan ini tidak terjadi kepada tamu lain dikedepannya . Tadi nya pingin coba seminggu tapi gak jadi deh . Tadi nya saya rekomendasi ke teman teman hotel addict tapi sekarang saya urungkan niat tersebut.
Sekilas review =
Bed Room = biasa saja mirip dengan hotel budget yaang angka nya double 2kali itu dari design dan wallpaper. Ac tidak dingin saya kegerahan tapi sdh males complaint
Bath room = biasa saja lagi lagi mirip hotel budget yang nama nya angka duakali penyebutan itu.
Bangunan = mewah terkesan megah, lobby bagus, resto bagus, lorong bagus, ruangan harum
Pelayanan = awal saya terima ramah hanya saja saat terjadi masalah di atas mereka tidak dapat berbuat banyak atau terkesan diam saja hingga kejadian dari bag receptionist dan hk ke room saya mengantarkan compliment.
Makanan pagi = banyak dan komplit tapi harus di perbaiki rasa nya
Cake shop = saya tau rasa nya krn di kasih compliment cake. Dan jujur saya akui enak cake nya . Bisa di bilang lumayan jago lah .
Saya pasti kembali untuk mereview ulang hotel ini. 
Hotel addict
title: Tempat bagus cm ada sedikit insiden.

owner_response.text:
Kepada Yang Terhormat Bapak / Ibu Tripadvisor Member,

Salam hangat dari Hotel Luminor Pecenongan - Jakarta..!

Atas nama manajemen Hotel Luminor Pecenongan - Jakarta, kami memohon maaf yang sebesar-besarnya atas ketidaknyamanan yang Bapak / Ibu dan keluarga alami pada saat menginap dihotel kami.

Keluhan dan masukan yang Bapak / Ibu sampaikan kepada kami sangat berharga sekali, dan hal tersebut sudah kami sampaikan langsung ke departemen terkait dalam hal ini Kepala Kantor Depan kami untuk memberikan pelatihan kembali kepada para Staff Front Desk / Supervisor / Assistant Manager,  serta beberapa tindakan tegas telah kami lakukan untuk memperbaiki dan meningkatkan pelayanan khususnya untuk lebih cakap dan tanggap dalam melayani tamu dan juga bagaimana dalam hal menangani tamu dalam situasi pada saat hotel penuh (overbooking).

Mengenai pendingin kamar yang tidak berfungsi dengan baik kami juga sudah langsung menyampaikan hal ini kepada kepala tehnisi untuk segera melakukan perbaikan dan selalu melakukan pengecekan serta perawatan berkala untuk seluruh pendingin kamar tamu kami. Dalam hal makanan,  kami juga sudah langsung menyampaikan kepada Kepala Juru Masak kami untuk selalu meningkatkan kualitas rasa makanan pada saat sarapan pagi dihotel kami.

Komentar dan saran yang membangun dari Bapak / Ibu merupakan tolak ukur untuk perbaikan kualitas hotel kami. Tentunya hal ini sangat bermanfaat untuk meningkatkan pelayanan kami khususnya kepada Bapak / Ibu dan kepada para tamu lainnya pada umumnya. 

Bapak / Ibu Tripadvisor Member sekali lagi kami memohon maaf dan berharap agar bapak/ibu dapat menikmati pelayanan dan fasilitas yang lebih baik lagi pada saat datang kembali menginap di hotel kami.

Apabila ada hal lain yang dapat saya lakukan atau Bapak / Ibu perlukan mohon tidak sungkan untuk menghubungi saya langsung di 021-344 7777 Ext.25 or Email: gm.pc@luminorhotel.com dan saya pasti akan menyambut bapak / ibu secara pribadi untuk dapat menginap dihotel kami kembali.
Atas perhatian Bapak / Ibu kami ucapkan terima kasih.

Hormat Kami,


Anang Ardiansyah
General Manager

Nilai plusnya dr hotel ini :
1. Hotel baru jadi bangunan enak dilihat
2. Dekat pusat kota jakarta, dekat gambir, dekat istana, dekat sama monas tentunya.

Overall puas dengan dan sesuai antara harga dan yg qt dapat

text:
Tanggal 21 Des lalu, saya kembali melakukan sesi pemotreran, kali ini di Luminor Hotel.

Termasuk hotel baru di wilayah pecenongan, dalam bayangan saya jika hotel baru seharusnya semua fasilitas masih baik, namun saat saya mandi di shower, air kotor di bawah tidak bisa mengalir lancar sehingga seperti kolam renang mini, dalam hati saya sempat beranggapan : "mungkin ini salah satu fasilitas hotel, terdapat kolam renang mini di shower".

text: Namanya yang mirip dengan group 'Lumire' menghadirkan nuansa tersendiri. Belum akan berusia setahun di penghujung 2016. Bintang 3 yang disandangnya sangat layak untuk service yang diberikan. Musholla-nya cukup besar, mampu menampung sekitar 40 orang jika seluruh lokasi dimanfaatkan. Sajian kulinernya beragam dan begitu variatif. Sambelnya mencapai 15 jenis di siang hari. Lokasi cukup strategis. Dekat dengan 2 masjid di lingkungan setempat, halte busway Pecenongan, stasiun kereta Juanda, mini market, dan beberapa ATM.

text:
This hotel is my current choice everytime I go to Jakarta with my father. I and my father have stayed here three times and I have to say that it is good choice if you are on a budget to stay in Jakarta, while going around the area for street food at night.

But there are some issues that I would like to address from all three previous visits in this hotel.

First, I don't know whether the hotel has a separate level for smoking rooms and non-smoking rooms. The first time on my visit, my room had a strong smell of burnt cigarettes. While on my third visit, my father saw guests next door smoking in his/her room, with leaving the door open.

Second, about the housekeeping. From all three previous visits, my room were totally left untouched, which is disappointing. It is because in other hotels, whether or not we hang the "please clean up the room" sign outside the door, the room will be directly cleaned up before the guests back to their room later in the afternoon, or after the check-in hour. That's why on my last visit, despite having booked a room (room 709) for 2 nights, my father decided to check out earlier. I suggest that the housekeeping staff should have their own checklist regarding the rooms that are currently being used and need to be cleaned up.

About the room, it is a bit small but fine. The only problems are the TV channels and wi-fi signal. The foreign TV channels are mostly Chinese and international news channels. The wi-fi signal is not strong enough so sometimes it is suddenly disconnected.

About the breakfast, I like the choices of food available. On the last visit,  I like that cauliflower au gratin.

I wish the management could address all the problems so that on my next visit, I won't find the same issues again.
title: A good place, but there are some issues

text:
Pro: easy to grab lunch and especially dinner, street food outside hotel, Seafood, soto mie, Padang rice, Starbucks, pancake, Chinese food.
Taxi outside hotel, and good location, easy to go around city.
Give thumbs for receptionist for their services, allow me to change 3 rooms in 2 nights stay and 1 of sweet receptionist lady who approach me after i check out, and say sorry about inconvenience during i stayed in this hotel, because of this (read Con.)

Breakfast not so fantastic.

The rest up to you to choose.

text:
Receptionist told me Due to the Pandemic, they do not seperate non smoking and smoking room/floor.

So when I found my room smelly, I ask to change the room. But the front desk told me that all Twin bed are Full. They can do treatment to the room.

Few minutes later, a boy come with a spray.. sprayed few times..then finished.

The room still smell bad after the spraying, there is no Window on the room that can be opened. So I just have try surviving whole night. I Could not sleep well..so I decided just 1 night is enough. And today I will just move to other Hotel.

Once is Enough...
title: Smoking room is mixed with non smoking

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Andy Darwin ,

Thank you for your recent stay at Luminor Hotel Pecenongan Jakarta and for your correspondence. We appreciate you taking the time to share your concerns.

The experience you describe causes us deep concern. When you plan to enjoy stay at Luminor Hotel Pecenongan Jakarta, you have every reason to expect the highest level of excellence in all aspect of your visit. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconveniences you experienced with the condition of your stay.

I can only reiterate our regret that we did not handle the situation properly. I hope you will give us a chance to regain your confidence and please be rest assured in our best attention and services at all times, we remain.

Mr. Darwin, I do appreciate you bringing this issue to our attention and therefore giving us opportunity to improve.
Please feel free to contact me directly should you plan to visit Jakarta in the near future and I would be personally arranging your stay with us.

Sincerely Yours,

Abdun Natsir
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
The interior is all great based on the rent price. I also have no problem with the cleanliness as well. 

But, I am experiencing a full of unpleasant experiences even within 1 hour after I checked in! 

First of all, a group of people can enter to inside my room based on their keys! Phewm, fortunately I am still fully clothed and not taking a bath. This family said that they were given the wrong keys by the receptionist.

Next, my Air-Con is not working well. The room was very hot. At the beginning, I thought it's happening in all rooms until I saw a housekeeper cleaning a room in front of mine and realized this room is quite cool. 

Then, I asked the receptionist to change the room and they said the hotel was fully booked for double bed and all guests have checked in.

Wow, what a full of lies here. The room in front of mine is also double bed and nobody entered there yet. I also opened several hotel booking apps and checked this hotel still have double bed room avaliable for this same day!
title: Terrible receptionist and service

text:
stayed here on recommendation of one of my friend for almost 10 days in a row.
Pros
location is ok as it is in central Jakarta and one can find the street foods till late night, few restaurants, taxi availability 24 hrs, near by bus & railway station, Alfa & Indo mart 

Great well designed lobby along with restaurant and an outside area where you can eat and smoke togather, rooms are   of decent size as well as washrooms. comfortable bed and excellent front office staff..breakfast was very good with good collection of local and continental spread.live kitchen was also available everyday
Cons
the only problem i will say is their poor services. the services are a big disappointment and tried not only once but several times. like if you call house keeping or room service hardly there is a chance that someone will pick the phone and second asking for glasses in the room or any other service they require everytime more then 30 minutes and that too after reminding them again. Language cant be an excuse as my local friend was with me . they really needed a improvement in the services.

Overall still i would recommend this hotel for the travelers . however  management should look into this to improve
title: Good Hotel but services needed to be improved a lot

text:
Okay, I have to write a very bad recommendation for this hotel.

I was a loyal and regular customer to this hotel since 2017. Mostly for my business rate. I have corporate rate in this hotel.

My office reserved me a standard room on Tuesday 22 Jan to 26 Jan. Since I needed to upgrade my room and will pay the difference I contacted one of the staff.

She told me that my request can be fullfil only from 24th to 26th. I agreed. She said it is reserved for me.

On 24th morning, before I go, I went to the FO and ask to be upgraded and pay the differences.

The FO told me my room will not available that day, and call the manager to explain to me.

The manager came and explain that my room is used for VIP from hotel owner.

Right.

This management does not understand how to keep a regular customer. And they just lost one.
title: Such a disappoinment

text: I was on an overnight stay in Jakarta with an early morning flight to catch the following morning. I picked the hotel based on its good accessibility, affordability and good reviews. I was not disappointed. The street outside the hotel was relatively  quiet and clean - unlike the messy image I normally have of Pasar Baru . Checking in and checking out was fast. The hotel lobby itself was welcoming. Rooms were clean and bed comfortable. I was on the 7th Floor. A higher floor would have been desirable with good view of Jakarta. Left the hotel around 6.30 am and was at the domestic terminal of the airport in just under half an hour. Except for roadside stalls, I did not find any other food outlet or convenience store within walking distance. I settled for supper at one road side stall just outside the hotel. Recommended if you just need a hotel as a base for other activities in Jakarta.
title: Affordable Hotel Great Location

text:
I stay in the Luminor hotel, not to expect good hospitality. But rudeness, is something that I can't tolerate. My sister asked the receptionist named HOLLY for our room key. And she asked which room. My sister then asked his son the number of their room. And this rude receptionist asked for the name, and tell my sister to remember her own room number! What? My sister didn't even ask her the room number. She asked her son, and she got that harsh reply? I want to tell this receptionist lady, if she wants to seat on the receptionist seat, at least she knows the number one rule: be nice and respect others. I wonder how the management employed that kind of staff for the hotel, who suppose to sell hospitality instead of the room. There are other hotels close with this area, which staff are nicer than her. The nicest staff in this hotel is only the house keeping lady. 

Then when we wait for the uber on lobby just sitting down, We looked at her just playing her phone.
I think the management have to give all the employee especially to HOLLY how to manage the guest.

Overall: if you just want to sleep, then this hotel is OK. But prepare for the staff rudeness!

text:
Incident 1: 3rd Sept 2017
After check-in, I realised I was assigned to a non smoking room. I made a call to the front desk to request a change of room. They mentioned they will check and revert back. However the call did not come and I have to personally follow up with them. I was then informed that there were no rooms available. It is a weekend and sunday. What is the possibility of a full occupancy in a jakarta hotel. 

I was upset that the choice of room was not presented or asked during check in process. Throughout my stay, i have to constantly head down outside the lobby and smoke.

Incident 2: 10 Sept 2017
I arrived at the counter early at 9.15am asking if early check in was available. Without making any efforts to provide a warm hospitality. I was turned away by just telling me the hotel policy is 2pm. 

Of these above incident, personally being in the travel and hospitality business. There was no sense of hospitality at all. I feel such a pity that luminor having a good product but the hospitality is below par of the product.
title: Great room but poor service

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Larry Chua,

Thank you for your recent stay at Luminor Hotel Pecenongan Jakarta and for your correspondence. We appreciate you taking the time to share your concerns. 

The experience you describe causes us deep concern. When you plan to enjoy stay at Luminor Hotel Pecenongan Jakarta, you have every reason to expect the highest level of excellence in all aspect of your visit. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconveniences you experienced with the condition of your stay at non-smoking room and when you requesting for early check-in at that time.

I can only reiterate our regret that we did not handle the situation properly. Kindly rest assured that appropriate training will be conducted to avoid the recurrence of such incident in the future.
I hope you will give us a chance to regain your confidence and please be rest assured in our best attention and services at all times, we remain. 

Mr. Larry Chua, I do appreciate you bringing this issue to our attention and therefore giving us opportunity to improve. 
Please feel free to contact me directly should you plan to visit Jakarta in the near future and I would be personally arranging your stay with us.


Sincerely Yours, 

Anang Ardiansyah
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Was ons eerste hotel bij aankomst in Indonesië. Jakarta goed hotel op loop afstand van verschillende bezienswaardigheden. Onder andere het vredesplein, de grootste Moskee en Kathedraal.
Zeker het koloniale stuk als de oude haven zijn de moeite waard voor een bezoek aan Jakarta!
title: Eerste twee dagen Jakarta

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Corshaarverzorging

Thank you for choosing Luminor Hotel Pecenongan Jakarta for your destination of choice in Jakarta, and for taking the time to share your stay experience with us on TripAdvisor.

I am delighted to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us.

It is our goal to give the best experience to our guest and I hope you will find your way back again to Luminor Hotel Pecenongan Jakarta soon. And We Always Treated Our Guest to feel like at Home.

Sincerely,

Abdun Natsir
General Manager
